title: Bug 18063[Contributions] SubActionBars should be made public
description: Build M5org.eclipse.ui.internal.SubActionBars is a generally useful class which allowseditors like MultiPageEditors to manage the action bars of their children.The classes SubMenuManager, SubStatusLineManager and SubToolBarManager arealready public (in org.eclipse.jface.action), but these classes are useless ontheir own  they only make sense in the context of a SubActionBars instance.SubActionBars should be moved to org.eclipse.jface.action so that it can alsobe used by other plugins.
